title: I've barely been home for a month and I already want to go back to college
body:
The amount of endless bitching my mom can do is just fucking ridiculous.  All day everyday she is complaining about something and ranting about how I play video games too much even though I spend most of my day at a full time job and then tutor my brothers when I get home.  This last weekend my dad, brothers, and I painted the whole back yard and she was still bitching at us.  I don't know what she wants from me.  I do everything right, but she's never fucking happy.  Jesus Christ.  Someone save me please.

End rant.
